recipe_name: Warm salad of potatoes, sweet red onions and oregano (insalata di patate, cipolle rosse e oregano)
author: Gennaro Contaldo
method: Cook the potatoes in their skins until tender.  Drain and remove the skins immediately.   Quarter them lengthways and place in a large bowl together with the sliced onions and green olives.   Add the oregano, olive oil, vinegar and salt.  Mix well and serve immediately.
